Special Qualities: Cold immunity, fire vulnerability, air walk, astral projection and etherealness, magic circle against good, misty breath, SR 20, DR 5/magic and cold iron, immunities
Abilities: Str 22, Dex 18, Con 17, Int 6, Wis 13, Cha 14
Feats: Alertness, Endurance, Flyby Attack, Improved Initiative, Multiattack

Combate: Air Walk (Su): A hoary steed can ride through the air as well as on the ground, as though affected by a permanent air walk spell.Astral Projection and Etherealness (Su): These abilities function just like the spells of the same names as cast by a 20th-level caster.Magic Circle Against Good (Su): This ability continuously duplicates the effects of the spell. A hoary steed cannot suppress this ability.Misty Breath (Su): The breath of a hoary steed functions like a constant obscuring mist spell.Immunities (Ex): A hoary steed is immune to all charm and hold spells or abilities.SEE WIKIPEDIA ENTRY: Horse
